relevant_communication:
For business services related to textile selection, use, care and maintenance: 
- the benefits of industrial laundry over home washing 
- the benefits of reusables over disposables 
- the benefits of availability over ownership
goals__remit: The European Textile Services Association (ETSA) is a non-profit making organisation which was set up in Brussels in 1994 to represent and promote the interests of textile service industry leaders in Europe. The textile services industry has an estimated turnover of circa €12 billion and employs over 135 000 persons in the EU. Textile services provide a sustainable alternative to disposables, washing at home and ownership of textiles. ETSA is the platform for networking and sharing of best practices for its 37 members: leading textile rental and supplier firms, national associations and research institutes. ETSA proactively monitors and lobbies on EU legislation and technical standards on its’ members behalf.
